location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 6 of 1823 from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire] to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, General Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter provides an itemised list of furniture purchased for the use of the Bushire Residency, including the cost of each item and a total, and provides explanations to justify the purchase of certain items.
